ygData.msgSnippet: POK????? is this a permanant Druid? lol ... __________________________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? HotJobs - Search new jobs daily now
ygData.messageBody:
POK?????
is this a permanant Druid? lol



--- Toni <silly_girl4ever@...> wrote:
>
> About the only place to find them is the bazaar.
> They are player crafted using pottery. If you don't
> have luclin, you should have a friend get them for
> you. they run from anywhere from 10pp up to 100pp
> on vazaelle. If you don't have luclin, I would
> recommend getting it. there are zones where you can
> fight & get tons of XP per fight & level fairly
> quickly. Would also recommend getting PoP just for
> PoK. you can go to almost any city on norrath &
> luclin, so you're not waiting for the boats or nexus
> spires anymore =D
> Katashaka Naboombu
> 51 Vah Shir Mystic
> "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@...> wrote:Yea,
> where do you get these steins anyway? I've looked
> everywhere and
> haven't had much luck. I heard it's easiest to find
> them in the new
> marketplace. I can't think of what it's called. But
> for tose of us
> that don't have the Luclin expansion where else can
> we find them?
>
> Thanks
> Steve
